data.representation.images.quantized

Class QuantizedImageHistogramDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.DataSet
      • data.representation.images.quantized.QuantizedImageHistogramDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class QuantizedImageHistogramDataSet
extends DataSet
    Data holder class for a list of quantized SIFT histograms in an image dataset.
